item.title: Not verifing the variable?
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

see if this works :

[scar]program New;
var
x, y: integer;
Bitmap:integer;
procedure declareBMPS;
begin
Bitmap := BitmapFromString(this is where the bitmap code would be)
end;
procedure ClickBMPS;
begin
wait(300+random(32));
movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(32)random(16));
clickmouse(x,y,true)
end;

Procedure FindBMPS;
begin
if(findBitmap(bitmap,x,y))then
ClickBMPS;
end;

begin
repeat
wait(1300)
DeclareBMPS;
FindBMPS;
until(false)

end.
[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Not verifing the variable?
item.dc:creator: @pistolbob pistolbob
item.description:
@pistolbob wrote:

okay so heres the script but without the bitmap because the bitmap is huge and dont want you all to have to deal with it. so
yea it says it doesnt reconize the y. but i have it declared. [code]
program New;
var
x,
y:integer;
Bitmap:integer;
procedure declareBMPS;
begin
Bitmap := BitmapFromString(this is where the bitmap code would be)
end;
procedure ClickBMPS;
begin
wait(300+random(32));
movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(32)random(16));
clickmouse(x,y,true)
end;

Procedure FindBMPS;
begin
if(findBitmap(bitmap,x,y))then
ClickBMPS;
end;

begin
repeat
wait(1300)
DeclareBMPS;
FindBMPS;
until(false)

end.
[/code]
so thanks for your help
